description: Complete state management overhaul with three-file architecture. Eliminates state file chaos with clean separation of runtime, persistent, and configuration data. Ships with pristine clean-slate template.
features: Three-file state management system (runtime, persistent, configuration)
Single source of truth for all configuration in configuration.json
New /aaa-config command for configuration management
New /reset-project-state command with granular reset options
Clean slate ships with only configuration.json (no pre-populated states)
Automatic state file migration with v6 backups
Configuration auto-correction for invalid values
State files properly separated by lifecycle
No more TEMPLATE_TIMESTAMP issues
Simplified state recovery and debugging
4-tier Document Router with intelligent routing strategy
Dynamic folder creation with semantic naming (Tier 4)
Document lifecycle management with freshness tracking
Import support for upgrades without duplication
Folder consolidation suggestions to prevent sprawl
Learning system for improved routing accuracy
Sprint-aware document organization
100% backward compatibility with numbered folders
Native Claude Code integration via .claude directory
40 specialized AI agents accessible via Task tool
94 custom commands for streamlined workflows
19 automated hooks for task automation
Real-time statusline showing project health
Enhanced setup.sh with interactive Claude Code configuration
Smart detection of Claude Code environment
Automatic path configuration for hooks
Improved user experience with opt-in integration
Rebuild workflow with 22 phases
Improvement selection system for existing projects
Document Registry for 80-90% token reduction
